head.supplied: [Highly esteemed Baron F von Mueller.] ¶ [Best thanks for all the Characeae sent to me. ¶ I have now determined those recently received and intend to publish the determinations in the autumn.] ¶ Ch s...

div.p: RB MSS M108b, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.
Hochgeehrter Herr Baron Fr. v. Müller.

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Besten Dank für alle die neu eingesandten Characeen

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.seg: Die in der letzten Zeilen erhaltenen habe ich nun bestimmt und

div.p: beabsichtige meine Bestimmungen in Herbst zu publiciren.
[Best thanks for all the Characeae sent to me.
I have now determined those recently received and intend to publish the determinations in the autumn.]

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

cell.p:
Lake Bonney,
South-east of SA.
Oct 1887 Dr Wehl
Marie Wehl? Dr Eduard Wehl died in 1876. Chara leptopithys
Chara leptopitys? f micrancantha

cell.style: padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.075in; padding-right: 0.075in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p:
Richmond River 1887 Miss A Edward, Chara coronata et A fragilis,
The genus is uncertain: algal genera with this epithet published before 1889 are Anabaena, Arthrodesmus, Arthrodesmus; Amphiprora fragilis was published in 1889 (AlgaeBase, accessed 19 January 2022).

div.p: Ch sp. Nitella Gunnii β fastigiata

cell.p:
King's Sound 1888 Frogate
W. W. Froggatt? In 1887-8 Froggatt collected insects for William Macleay near the present town of Derby, on King Sound in the Kimberley region of WA (Macleay (1889), issued September 1888). Some botanical specimens went to M; see B88.06.01. Ch. gymnopus β ceylonia
